description: Lists the data ingestion jobs for a data source. The list also includes information about each job.

parameters.name: dataSourceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the data source for the list of data ingestion jobs.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Contains information about the filters for filtering the data. (dict) --- The definition of a filter to filter the data. The name of field or attribute to apply the filter. The operation to apply to the field or attribute. A list of values that belong to the field or attribute. (string) ---

nested_params.name: attribute
nested_params.description: The name of field or attribute to apply the filter.

nested_params.name: operator
nested_params.description: The operation to apply to the field or attribute.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: A list of values that belong to the field or attribute.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base for the list of data ingestion jobs.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Contains details about how to sort the data. The name of field or attribute to apply sorting of data. The order for sorting the data.

nested_params.name: attribute
nested_params.description: The name of field or attribute to apply sorting of data.

nested_params.name: order
nested_params.description: The order for sorting the data.

nested_items.name: ingestionJobSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of data ingestion jobs with information about each job.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the data source for the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: ingestionJobId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base for the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The time the data ingestion job started.

nested_items.name: statistics
nested_items.description: Contains statistics for the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: numberOfDocumentsDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of source documents that were deleted.

nested_items.name: numberOfDocumentsFailed
nested_items.description: The number of source documents that failed to be ingested.

nested_items.name: numberOfDocumentsScanned
nested_items.description: The total number of source documents that were scanned. Includes new, updated, and unchanged documents.

nested_items.name: numberOfMetadataDocumentsModified
nested_items.description: The number of metadata files that were updated or deleted.

nested_items.name: numberOfMetadataDocumentsScanned
nested_items.description: The total number of metadata files that were scanned. Includes new, updated, and unchanged files.

nested_items.name: numberOfModifiedDocumentsIndexed
nested_items.description: The number of modified source documents in the data source that were successfully indexed.

nested_items.name: numberOfNewDocumentsIndexed
nested_items.description: The number of new source documents in the data source that were successfully indexed.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time the data ingestion job was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than the maxResults value provided in the request, use this token when making another request in the nextToken field to return the next batch of results.
